messages.title: Ipswich Labour MP Blocks Brexit!
messages.content: Three years ago over 58% of people in Ipswich voted to leave the EU. Since then, your Labour MP has repeatedly blocked Brexit and has voted in favor of EU membership almost 50 times. This lack of respect for democracy has frustrated local people who voted for something different. People across Ipswich feel their voices have been ignored and we need an MP who will represent the people and not go against what was voted for.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done, no more delays. Honour the referendum and leave the EU.
Invest an extra £33.9 billion into the NHS. Hiring 20,000 more police officers.
More funding for every school, ensuring every child gets a proper education.
Improvements to our roads and rail services, including the long overdue northern bypass.
Supporting NHS services to recruit more GPs locally.
Ensuring local homes for local people, so that Ipswich residents have access to council housing.

images.caption: Tom Hunt and Boris Johnson – the team to get Brexit done.
